amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing small business regulatory relief and preventing duplicative regulations for investment advisors.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 852 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 852 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Ayotte. (consideration: CR S1885-1886; text: CR S1885) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing small business regulatory relief and preventing duplicative regulations for investment advisors.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 852 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Ayotte.
